title: Silver Jeans Co. Men's Gordie Relaxed Fit Straight Leg Jeans
description: EVERYDAY DENIM STYLE. Our Gordie Relaxed Fit Straight Leg Jeans are a go-to classic with 5-pocket styling and a zip fly and button closure. Available in multiple washes.

EASE INTO COMFORT. With a RELAXED FIT so you can be comfortable all day, these jeans are a pair you'll reach for on casual or dressy occasions. Rise: Sits just below the waist with a loose relaxed hip and thigh.Inseam: 30/32/34/36''; Leg Opening: 19''

ROOM TO MOVE. Perfect for larger builds, Gordie is our most relaxed fit with plenty of room from waist to ankle. It sits just below the waist with a longer saddle, so you're guaranteed a comfortable, everyday fit.
STYLE AND DURABILITY. Practical and stylish, these jeans are made from 99% Cotton, 1% Elastane for style that lasts and hold up throughout the day.
YOUR WARDROBE UPGRADE. These RELAXED FIT STRAIGHT leg jeans for men feature classic, well-designed pockets, ideal for storing your essentials without compromising the aesthetic.

Silver Jeans Co. Gordie Relaxed Fit Straight Leg Jeans - Perfect for larger builds, Gordie is our most relaxed fit with plenty of room from waist to ankle. It sits at the waist with a longer saddle for a guaranteed comfortable, everyday fit. Finished with an 18.5” straight leg opening.
